website_summaries.verdict: A great glove for outfielders with small hands.
pros: Double palm construction delivers optimal stability
Low profile heel gives the glove plenty of flexibility
Designed to conform to the hand
cons: May require additional time to break in properly

customer_reviews.title: Good glove but, horrible lacing... great product warranty!
customer_reviews.text: Lacing of webbing lasted less than 2 months as a backup glove. Update: I contacted Wilson about the glove lacing issue via their online warranty program. Sent in the picture and within an hour or so, had a voucher for the replacement at Wilson.com. No need to hassle with shipping the old glove back.
customer_reviews.author: SDL

customer_reviews.title: Not good, disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Pretty disappointed in this one. Great reviews don’t live up to the hype. Super stiff glove and even after 5+ trips to oven with glove softeners and also standard glove conditioners only a minimal improvement. My son simply can’t squeeze it closed and doesn’t use it. I can get my hand in and it is difficult for me to squeeze. Plus it’s relatively heavy compared to his other glove. Total waste of money, look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Clayton

customer_reviews.title: if you are looking for a good glove and not yet ready to pull the trigger ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He currently plays 12U select and he absolutely loves the Pedroia Fit on this glove, if you are looking for a good glove and not yet ready to pull the trigger on an A2K or A2000 this is the one to go with.
customer_reviews.author: MikeTX

customer_reviews.title: Great quality glove @ a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Wilson A500 last year, broke it in and handed it down to my 5yr old son. Great glove! So I bought this A900 and its definitely an upgrade from the A500. Leather feels great. Design is awesome. Will need some time to break it in but I'm loving this glove so far !
customer_reviews.author: lopez07si

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glove. The leather quality is a big step ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glove. The leather quality is a big step up from the A500 series. As far as I can tell the leather is similar to the A1000s. Both will have a much faster break-in than A2000. Similar to Rawlings Gamer series or Mizuno MVP Prime Future. The Pedroia fit makes this glove work for even a 6/7 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Glove!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great glove. Perfect for a 2nd basemen. The leather is high quality and is very comfortable to use. I personally don’t like the make them very soft because it’s a lot easier to to get the ball in and out specially in a double play situation. But if you are buying this for a young kid, you may need some conditioning. But in general this is a great glove , great quality and a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: mr balas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glove
customer_reviews.text: Quality of this glove is outstanding and can't be beat for this price point. Leather on this glove is amazing. I was previously a fan of another brand but I think I'll be buying Wilson gloves from now on. I just wish the description of this glove would specify if it is for you or adults.
customer_reviews.author: Corey Noble

customer_reviews.title: The best gloves for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Easy to form a pocket, they are soft with a nice feel and (so far, 6 months) they last long time with proper care and storage. My son is a serious player who has games or practices 7 days a week, year round. We went to more than a few stores to look at gloves, and he likes the 900 series more than the 2000's. He has a outfield and a 1st base glove, and they holding up great over the past 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kalani Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Solid quality glove for a great price
customer_reviews.text: Nice pre broken in leather with a good rich feel to it. The web is nice and makes for a great fielding glove. Definitely not a glove just on the cheap. It stands up to some of the Rawlings gloves my son and I have owned over the years. I definitely recommend the Wilson A series line. Just a heads up this one is as easy to break in as one would want without sacrificing feel, padding or quality. Be prepared to shape it gently how you like but can be played with day one no problems
customer_reviews.author: James C. Leach II

customer_reviews.title: Great Economical glove For young, serious ball players.
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for the young baseball player. I was on the hunt for a cost effective glove for my 8&11 yr old boys in travel baseball. I didn’t want cheap “leather” and I didn’t want to spend a ton on a glove yet. Was also tired of the Typical selection in the local sports store or lack there of. This is a great glove. It needs to be broken in like other gloves, but the process is easier. The leather isn’t cheap and keeps it shape. Definitely one to give a try if you’re in the market for youth glove. I know 5 kids that have the A900s and they all enjoy them.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful glove
customer_reviews.text: This glove is as attractive as it gets! Leather is thick and seems to be high quality for the price. We bought the 12" for my 10 yr old. The hand slot is a little big for his hand right now but you don't want to go smaller or they will grow out of it too fast. It does need broken in a lot just like most gloves. Use glove oil on it regularly and wrap it with a ball in it every night. Then play catch as much as possible!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T.

customer_reviews.title: A2000 replacement
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality glove. Originally bought my son an a2000 which I thought he would have for life, and he lost it after a season and a half. Bought this as a replacement and was surprised at how similar the glove is for the significant savings, in pretty sure the a2000 is just better leather. For kids younger than high school this glove is fantastic and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S.

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. Son loves it. He also has the a2k pedrioa glove and the quality of this glove is just as good. High quality glove for great price.
customer_reviews.author: John Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Honestly this is a great glove. Very comfortable and double padding. My son loves it. He is 13 yrs old and plays majors with this team. But you do have to remember to take care of the glove clean it and use some vaseline. This glove is easy to shape no need to put it in the oven. Which I personally think it's stupid common sense tells you put leather in extreme heat you are drying the leather and laces so it will not last .
customer_reviews.author: Don18

customer_reviews.title: Promptly replaced the first glove.  Thanks
customer_reviews.text: My son used this glove less than a month. It came apart at practice tonight. :( Rec’d June 20 stitching broke July 19th!!
customer_reviews.author: Niki

customer_reviews.title: Laces turned, after only having it for one month.
customer_reviews.text: Black Laces already tore, where the pocket connects to the glove body. Just one month old.... new glove.... and already torn. Very disappointed, will contact manufacturer, hopefully they will help. I will attempt to repair.... very sad my boy had to experience his new favorite glove fail so early.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Not for my 9 year old skinny boy.
customer_reviews.text: This glove is really hard to break in. I really tried and my boy had a hard time with it. He is pretty skinny so this might work on a stronger kid but my boy really struggled closing this glove.
customer_reviews.author: J. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for the price . Typical breakin period, put some oil on it and play catch for a few hours. Purchased for a 12 year old all star should last 3-4 years till a bigger size is needed.
customer_reviews.author: frugal

customer_reviews.title: Easiest mitt to break in!
customer_reviews.text: This thing came completely useable right at my door! I've never owned a first base mitt before, so I'm not sure if they're normally this loose, but this one felt like I've been using it for a season! I had to fix the lacing on the wrist strap (it was too big) but that was an easy job and there were already holes cut to lace it through.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Twice, the security device was not removed
customer_reviews.text: The glove is a great product. HOWEVER, if you can not use it because an anti-shoplifting device is attached to the wrist strap, you can not use this great product. I returned my first order with notes about the problem. I returned first order and reordered the item, Guess what, the item in the second order had the anti-shoplifting device, too! Who is the Quality Control for AMAZON? No 3rd party was involved. Wasting my time going to UPS for returns. Step up your game, AMAZON.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent Glove for the Price Point
customer_reviews.text: Overall it's a nice glove for the price. This is my ideal gove size but the hand insert feels smaller than my previous gloves this size and the ball doesn't hit the sweet spot of the pocket as well as I expected it to. Hopefully after some more breaking in that will change. If I live long enough to buy another baseball glove, I'll just go all out with an A2000.
customer_reviews.author: Jim_ [13]

customer_reviews.title: Fits my small/medium sized adult hands well.  Ignore stiffness haters.
customer_reviews.text: People were griping about the stiffness of a mitt in the comments. I got the first base mitt, and to me, its part of the experience to break in your own mitt so it forms perfectly to your hand. Went out and played catch without a problem immediately after it was delivered. Love the smell of the leather. Would highly recommend buying this mitt. If you're deciding between this mitt and a few of the other highly rated Rawlings mitts (as I was), 1000% spend the extra $10 or so to get this one, its much higher quality and marked down from a significantly higher price. BUY THIS MITT!
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Easy to break in but didn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Good glove for almost a year. 2 season and the inside completely fell apart. Easy to break in and worked good for a bit... Good fit for a 10 to 12 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Tomegunb

customer_reviews.title: Good glove
customer_reviews.text: Good glove for price. Ready for field out of box with little break in. Lotion and a practice day catching good to go for play
customer_reviews.author: ai

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, this glove is almost playable. The glove gives great feedback, has a nice deep pocket, and the double break (Your choice of breaking it in with a single break, or double break) makes this glove feel that much nicer. This is the first non-Rawlings glove I have purchased, and couldn’t be happier.
customer_reviews.author: IndyNova

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic non premium glove
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality after reading some reviews. I'm used to $200+gloves, but needed something for a Sunday league(players reaching 85mph). This glove is great for the money, I'd recommend this glove for any league up through Highschool.
customer_reviews.author: David Kinney

customer_reviews.title: Comfort / Value
customer_reviews.text: My son said it feels very uncomfortable, and not happy with this glove, he is using his old glove since this glove does not support the support inside the glove . Won't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Tovar

customer_reviews.title: The Glove is The Best I've Had Yet
customer_reviews.text: I love this baseball mitt! My parents bought me it because my previous mitt broke. I got it two weeks ago and have lots of success. I play right field for a 12u baseball team, we played a tournament 3 days after I got the mitt and broke it in. During that tournament I had 11 catches in the outfield out of three games. The glove is a great fit for kids around 10-14 years old. I got the a900 pedroia fit, 11.5 inch's.
customer_reviews.author: Isaak Rubley

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My 13 year old loves the glove. I don’t know if his performance do to practice or the glove. Lol. Great glove!
customer_reviews.author: ALAN KELLY

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid baseball glove
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this glove for a 11 year old but it can certainly be used by older kids through high school. I am very happy with the glove!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Fits well, almost game ready out of the box, plenty of padding.
customer_reviews.text: Great first base glove. plenty of padding for repeated plays. Glove was just about game ready out of the box for my 12u player. Minimal break-in required. It went an entire spring season and held up great. This is our second Wilson glove from the "A" lineup. I definitely recommend the 900 series and up for the older players.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good glove at reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I love the glove and it works great. Only reason for giving it less than 5 stars is that after only about 2 months of use, the leather lacing in the web broke! I was able to re-lace it myself, but it was a lot more extensive than I thought based on where the lace tore. Otherwise, great glove.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel L Milam III

customer_reviews.title: 900 is nothing like the 800
customer_reviews.text: Had this glove little over four months it already coming apart . It was post to be compared to the 800 .there is no comparison. The 800 is much thicker and stronger 900 is a down grade .
customer_reviews.author: brain stanley

customer_reviews.title: Soft leather, solid glove!
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove for recreation. May go a size bigger for softball though. Used for coaching little league and it’s a very nice glove!
customer_reviews.author: RoJo

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove for the money
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up a few months ago...Broke is quick and was game ready after like 15 times throwing it around. Used some glove conditioners it to help with the break in process. Will get my son one (9U travel player) to replace his current glove before next season to allow for adequate break in.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: It's probably fine for other players
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item... the leather was too soft and just not my style of glove. It's probably fine for other players!
customer_reviews.author: Alan C. Earing

customer_reviews.title: As soft as a brick.
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment. There is nothing good about this glove. The size is off and this glove is nowhere near game ready as claimed. It's as soft as a brick. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: The Godfather

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glove
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glove I took it to Dicks to soften it and now it is probably the best glove I HAVE EVER OWNED
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great leather
customer_reviews.text: Great glove for 8-12 year old. Great leather and laces. Holds shape and will last a few seasons. A good glove to have right before you make the expense for a A2000 or Heart of Hide.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: Best Value!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality with minimal beak in time. Purchased for my 8U son who catches most games. loves the glove. Plenty of room for growth yet not too big for him to use now. Also has the A900 11.5 H-Web infield mit, best youth gloves on the marked, hands down.
customer_reviews.author: william collins

customer_reviews.title: great little league glove
customer_reviews.text: it turned my son into a pro! Always had rawlings prior to this glove and it is night and day better quality.
customer_reviews.author: GBerios

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality. Bought it to replace the glove I’ve had since Babe Ruth. Great fit, a little stiff but already starting to soften. Would buy again without hesitation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My son's favorite glove
customer_reviews.text: My son loves baseball and read all the reviews to find a new glove. He wanted this one and got it over summer. He broke it in over the summer and loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glove!
customer_reviews.text: Love this glove! My son has the first base mitt version as well and both are great. Probably the quickest to break in that he's had.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for adults infielder mit or teenager ball glove
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glove! Definitely an infielders glove. I wear my gloves with the bottom of my palm out and this fits my hand perfect. Hardy no time to break it in. Didn’t use any oil or oven, just playing catch.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Broke at the first practice.
customer_reviews.text: My boy was excited to get this glove. Nice glove, good leather. Fairly easy to break in. He took it to his first practice and was catching infield drills. After approx. 20 balls the pocket broke. Very disappointed! Now I'm having to spend extra money to get it relaced! I still believe with good laces it will be a good glove.
customer_reviews.author: jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glove for the weekend warrior. The fit is very nice. Quality leather takes a few days to break in. It's not the A2000, but for the price, it's pretty sweet.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Who knew Pedroia had small hands?
customer_reviews.text: I did not know that he did. So this glove does not fit my giant hand. Other than that, great quality leather.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Decent glove
customer_reviews.text: Decent glove. A bit on the small side. Would never work for a teenager or adult. Kids glove
customer_reviews.author: Zach W

customer_reviews.title: Wrong hand
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong hand glove and couldn't return in time.
customer_reviews.author: OBXrealtor

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at such a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this glove! I play in an adult amateur baseball league and I bought this glove to pitch because I retired my hand made glove as it was deteriorating from use over the yrs and I wanted to preserve my youth memories. Its a bit hard new but after some old school break in and leather conditioner its perfect!!! And for the price its perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: BORI69

customer_reviews.title: Great glove!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this glove. Perfect Infield glove. Great quality. We got the pedroia fit for a 8year old. Would highly recommend buying!
customer_reviews.author: Kai

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful well made glove. Gift for my 10th grade grandson. He tried one on at Dicks and loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Texan Chick Producer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: It took a while to break in. Broke it in naturally by using it when practicing with my son. He finally switched to it from his worn down A500.
customer_reviews.author: Jejay

customer_reviews.title: Good quality glove.
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. My 12 year old plays on a travel team. We have had good experiences with the A800 and A900 line of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Great glove.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the glove for my 10 year old in travel baseball for Christmas. Already came broken in enough for him to jump right into practicing with it. Seems like a quality glove that should last him for a few years of non stop abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Neill

customer_reviews.title: Good catch.
customer_reviews.text: Very small glove but a great buy. Needs to be bigger
customer_reviews.author: Fiktishes

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glove for this price point. This glove has a great feel and is ready to use. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan E. Daggett

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a birthday present. No complaints yet. Still works great for the person I purchased for
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B Locklin

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove
customer_reviews.text: Nice glove. Takes a bit to break in though, so be patient.
customer_reviews.author: RL Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Security pin tag still attached, not useable.
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled over the look and feel of the glove. Not to thrilled about the security tag that was still attached to the glove when I opened it. I will need to return this glove now because I can’t use it with the security tag. Makes me believe this glove was stolen and resold? Not too happy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old son after his old glove wore out. Took some time to break in but overall a good glove.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Great Youth glove
customer_reviews.text: Very stiff upon delivery, but after breaking it in with glove oil and a lot of rubber bands, it is a great glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great mitt for the money. Easy break in period as it comes.
customer_reviews.author: Reading Student

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son is 14 and in high school. He loves this glove.
customer_reviews.author: Skyler

customer_reviews.title: Good glove for the money
customer_reviews.text: A little tough to break in, but has been a great glove to use coaching softball and throwing with my kids.
customer_reviews.author: tBryant Furniture

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I am a coach I bought it for my son who plays first base and also to use for my team’s first baseman’s glove when needed. I’m still breaking it in but my son is using it at practice and having success after just a little bit of oil and some break in period.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price but thats really all I can say. Not top of the line leather or laces. It didn't quite fit my hand, it is made more for 11-15 years olds in my opinion. A good buy though for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Slade Nichols

customer_reviews.title: Nice glove
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the glove came with a magnetic lock attached to it. No key came included to unlock it. A little strange. Had to go to a retail store and have them remove the lock.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Best choice I could have made. Great glove, great material for the best price
customer_reviews.author: Sean S

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the price, breaks in easy
customer_reviews.text: This is my 10 yr olds 2nd one, the Pedroia fit features an inner liner for smaller hands and the 800 series got loose making an uncomfortable feel for him”treatment issue” so I replaced it with the 900 ... I would buy another
customer_reviews.author: Justin ingle

customer_reviews.title: nice glove!
customer_reviews.text: great glove for us weekend warriors. takes some time to break in. leather is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: i think this is a kids glove.
customer_reviews.text: i think this is a kids glove. I bought it for the wife to play- it works but i think its too small
customer_reviews.author: skeletor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome glove
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited by this purchase......can't wait till spring baseball season starts!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4!

customer_reviews.title: Security tag 2x
customer_reviews.text: Glove is perfect, but Amazon needs to get their crap together. Original and replacement both had the security tag left on the glove. Of course no way to get ahold of anyone. Guess I will keep reordering until they get it right.
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER

customer_reviews.title: Great glove at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Glove is great quality and easy to break in. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Peiffer

customer_reviews.title: Solid glove!
customer_reviews.text: Great fielding glove for my 9 year old. He normally uses a Nokona glove. Actually likes this one better now!
customer_reviews.author: stylist54

customer_reviews.title: Quality and craftsmanship
customer_reviews.text: Really like the relatively small break in period. This is a quality glove if you’re not looking to spend money on an A2000.
customer_reviews.author: S.H

customer_reviews.title: Good glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: We did have to send back the first one we ordered because some of the laces broke with a hard catch. It seems to be functioning very well the second go round. My son says it's a comfortable, ready to use glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glove but I wouldn’t expect anything less with Wilson A++.
customer_reviews.author: wayne s.

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: How am i supposed to remove that anti theft piece?
customer_reviews.author: Jose D. Gomez

customer_reviews.title: No break-in necessary.
customer_reviews.text: Great glove. My godson, 10U travel ball player, was able to use the A900 immediately. No break-in period necessary.
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: Ready to play
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. Feels good. Ready to play without break-in but, feels even better with only a little.
customer_reviews.author: D Mann

customer_reviews.title: Firm and good leather.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent glove for price point. Perfect if you like a stiffer mitt.
customer_reviews.author: A.R. Jones III

customer_reviews.title: Great price, nice glove
customer_reviews.text: Great price for this glove. Soft leather, looks good, breaks in pretty easily
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J. Vigansky

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to break in
customer_reviews.text: I am amazed with this product. I love how easy it is to break in with the boiling water system. I was out in the yard playing catch within an hour of being delivered. I do not think I will ever own any other type of glove other than Wilson.
customer_reviews.author: Nerful

customer_reviews.title: Best youth glove around
customer_reviews.text: Will make my grandson’s Christmas. Top quality-reminds me of my A2000 from years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good glove. Doesn't take long to fully break in. Great leather.
customer_reviews.author: J. Shiflett

customer_reviews.title: This is a high-quality glove
customer_reviews.text: Delivered on time and it looks like a great glove I’m sure my son will love it
customer_reviews.author: Kristen 32223

customer_reviews.title: Nice value
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality glove. Fits properly on an adult as an infielders glove but could be used easily for a younger player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good leather for the money
customer_reviews.text: My 10 y/o son loves this glove. He is very picky about his baseball gloves. He plays 1st base and this is the perfect mitt for him. It required a bit of break in.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: It’s a medium ranged level glove, not too expensive. Made of all leather. Broke in nicely. No complaints. Been using it for the past few weeks now and I’m happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: jarred

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Only oiled it once and it was pretty much broken in already. Very sturdy glove. Thought it would be flimsy but it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Snoop

customer_reviews.title: It takes two for two grandsons.
customer_reviews.text: exactly as expected. we bought two and our twin grandsons liked them very much.
customer_reviews.author: oldneu

customer_reviews.title: very good for catching
customer_reviews.text: we got this kit for may 12 year old son who is a very talented first baseman he said it is very comfortable and is very good for grounders and pop flys
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great Glove, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Great glove at a great price. The quality of the leather is really good. A little adjustment to fit my hand and a relatively quick break in period.
customer_reviews.author: ghv5

customer_reviews.title: Good Glove
customer_reviews.text: Good glove.. Took a good amount of time to break in.... Needed a good beating and a lot of catch.. I would not recommend buying too close to the season.... This glove was used by my 8 year old and fit him well....
customer_reviews.author: NDStuch

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Great feeling glove, came semi broken in so it was ready to use. My son loves this glove.
customer_reviews.author: Danny H

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old son loves it, in particular, the color and the padding.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Try on before buying
customer_reviews.text: I’m 6’ so this glove for my small for my taste.. I probably needed a 13” glove. But that’s what I get for not going to the store to try on before buying. Otherwise, the glove is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: alejandro serrano

product_meta.title: Wilson A900 Baseball Glove Series
product_meta.description: The A900 baseball glove has a cool, old school look with its dark brown leather. Even better, this glove is game ready day one. There's no long winter break-in or sore knuckles punching the leather. A leather shell, laces and palm liner create this full leather glove. Double Palm Construction and a low profile heel give the glove flexibility while maintaining stability. - 11.5 Inch Pattern - Game Ready - Full Leather Construction - Double Palm Construction - Low Profile Heel
feature_bullets: Double Palm Construction (front side); Low Profile Heel (front side); Full Leather Construction
Right Hand Throw; Worn on Left Hand
